level.text: In the CHC Overlay District, the development standards in §§ 1572.3 through 1572.4 shall serve as the maximum permitted floor area ratio for a planned unit development.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: Final Rulemaking published at 49 DCR 9064, 9070-73 (October 4, 2002); as corrected by Final Rulemaking published at 49 DCR 10594, 10600-10603 (November 22, 2002).
